message.content:
<<<api>>>: Iterator.next
<<<code>>>: 
for (Iterator<Column> it = cf.iterator(); it.hasNext(); ) {
    Column cell = it.next();
    String name = ByteBufferUtil.string(cell.name());
    String value = ByteBufferUtil.string(cell.value());
    log(" name = " + name);
    log(" value = " + value);
}
<<<explanation>>>: You're iterating over the ColumnFamily cf using an Iterator. For each iteration, you're getting the next Column cell, and then extracting the name and value from the cell. The name and value are then logged.
